alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clermont; Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 3:24PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON... CLERMONT AND NORTHWESTERN BROWN COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EST... At 323 PM EST, a snow shower was located over Camp Dennison, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Norwood, Blue Ash, Loveland, Reading, Montgomery, Madeira, Wyoming, Milford, Deer Park, Forestville, Amelia, Mount Orab, Mariemont, Bethel, Williamsburg, Terrace Park, Batavia, Camp Dennison, and Remington. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 8 and 19. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 10 and 12. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
